# tf.config.experimental_list_devices

List the names of the available devices.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/config/experimental_list_devices"><code>tf.compat.v1.config.experimental_list_devices</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/config/experimental_list_devices"><code>tf.compat.v2.config.experimental_list_devices</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/config/experimental_list_devices"><code>tf.contrib.eager.list_devices</code></a>


``` python
tf.config.experimental_list_devices()
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Returns:

Names of the available devices, as a `list`.
